Table.Name: delivery_type_rate
Table.Label: per delivery type throughput and error ratio

Table.Name: email_driver_message_counts_inst
Table.Label: Email Driver Message Counts
Table.Description: Email Driver Message Counts of a driver instance

ColumnDef.Name: Received
ColumnDef.Label: Messages Received by this driver
ColumnDef.Description: Total received messages of this instance

ColumnDef.Name: Sent
ColumnDef.Label: Messages Sent by this driver instance

ColumnDef.Name: ReceivingFailed
ColumnDef.Label: Messages Received failed by this driver
ColumnDef.Description: Total failed received messages of this driver

ColumnDef.Name: SendingFailed
ColumnDef.Label: Messages Sent failed by this driver
ColumnDef.Description: Total messages failed to be sent out on this driver instance

Table.Name: email_driver_performance_inst

Table.Description: Email Driver Message Counts of a driver instance

ColumnDef.Name: SendingTime
ColumnDef.Label: Sending latency of this driver instance

ColumnDef.Name: SendingThroughput
ColumnDef.Label: Messages Sent per second by this driver instance

ColumnDef.Name: SendingErrorRatio
ColumnDef.Label: Error ratio of outbound messages of this driver
ColumnDef.Description: Error ratio of outbound messages on this driver instance

ColumnDef.Name: ReceivingErrorRatio
ColumnDef.Label: Error ratio of inbound messages of this driver
ColumnDef.Description: Error ratio of inbound messages of this driver
